term.title: ring-sector

item.text: A sequence of ring atoms, linked together as an unbranched chain and connecting two bridgeheads or junctions, but not itself containing any bridgehead or junction, is termed an atomic ring-sector. A bond linking together directly two bridgeheads or junctions is termed a bond ring-sector.

term.citation: Citation: 'ring-sector' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.R05398
